hero.title: E-Ledger
hero.subtitle: Digital Ledger and Financial Compliance Solutions
hero.description: Take your financial records into the digital era and manage all accounting processes in full legal compliance. ESM E-Ledger enables the creation, storage and submission of statutory ledgers (journal and general ledger) in electronic format according to the Turkish Revenue Administration (TRA) standards. It eliminates the burden of paper-based bookkeeping while ensuring complete data integrity, accuracy and audit readiness.

overview.title: Why Choose E-Ledger?
overview.description: E-Ledger is a cornerstone of financial transparency and corporate sustainability in the digital transformation journey. It replaces manual bookkeeping, minimizes errors and guarantees full legal compliance. ESM E-Ledger provides a secure, standardized and audit-ready structure for businesses of all sizes, ensuring their financial data remains accurate and accessible.

benefits: Eliminates paper, printing and storage expenses
Ensures accurate, complete and timely creation of legal ledgers
Fully compliant with TRA regulations and standards
Simplifies and accelerates audit and review processes
Keeps financial data secure and easily accessible

features.title: Electronic Ledger Creation
features.description: Automatically generates journal and general ledger records in digital format. Preserves data integrity and reduces manual workload.

features.title: Compliance and Security
features.description: Fully aligned with national tax authority standards. Digital signatures and financial seals guarantee the authenticity of all records.

features.title: Automated Archiving and Access
features.description: Ledgers are securely stored in the cloud for the entire legal retention period. Authorized users can access records instantly when needed.

features.title: Audit and Reporting Efficiency
features.description: All entries are prepared in standardized formats. Auditing, reporting and control processes become faster and error-free.

implementation.title: Implementation Process
implementation.description: Our proven methodology ensures smooth deployment and maximum ROI
